mapper.select: SELECT /* BrandshopMapper.XML, selectBrandshopInfo, SAC 전시, 2014-04-16 */ BRAND_SHOP_NO AS BRAND_ID , BRAND_SHOP_NM , CATEGORY_NO , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC WHERE MENU_ID = CATEGORY_NO AND LANG_CD = 'ko' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS MENU_NM , CONCAT( LOGO_IMG_PATH, LOGO_IMG_NM ) AS LOG_IMG_POS , LOGO_IMG_NM AS BNR_IMG_NM , LOGO_IMG_SIZE AS BNR_IMG_SIZE , EXPO_ORD FROM TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP WHERE BRAND_SHOP_NO = #{brandshopId}
